AddI
rO = rO + l5
000000001111_00000_000_00000_0010011

rl = rO + l
000000000001_00000_000_00001_0010011

r2 = rl + 3
000000000011_00001_000_00010_0010011

r3 = r2 + [num];


AND
r4 = rO & r4
0000000_00010_00011_111_00100_0110011

OR
r3 = rO | rI7
0000000_00011_00000_110_00101_0110011


store number at memory address five twelve then put it
back into regist 32

addi five twelve
001111111111_11101_000_11110_0010011
000001000000_00011_000_11000_0010011
store
